Background

I'm currently looking for opportunities in data science teams. I recently graduated from National Institute of Technology, Raipur, Chhattisgarh, India. I am open for opportunities for both full time and internship roles.

As a developer, I enjoy developing application and projects using my technical skills and engineering knowledge. My goal is to discover, analyze and manipulate — the power of 'data'.

When I'm not in front of a computer screen, I'm probably playing football, designing, or clicking pictures.
